definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: A method of wastewater treatment is studied by using aluminum sulfate and polyacrylamide in wine Brewing.
sentences.chinese: 研究了硫酸鋁聚丙烯酰胺法處理釀酒廠廢水。

sentences.english: The preparation of aluminium sulfate by using laminated slate as raw material is presented.
sentences.chinese: 用頁岩石爲原料製備硫酸鋁。

sentences.english: Under the optimum conditions, the aluminum sulfate product can reach the standard of non-iron aluminium sulfate.
sentences.chinese: 在最佳條件下，產品中鐵含量可達無鐵硫酸鋁要求。

sentences.english: The flocculating constituents formed by coagulation with ferric chloride is thinner and denser than with aluminum sulfate.
sentences.chinese: 氯化鐵混凝形成的最終絮體較硫酸鋁的細密。
